entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries late this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
